title: Looking for an Old Mill or EPDG Jennings portrait
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Looking for an Old Mill or EPDG Jennings portrait
posts.post_content: Can buy or trade.  I would prefer Fair to VG, but may be interested in higher or lower depending on the actual card.  If you have one available, please send me scans at [url]lukealyon@gmail.com[/url].   Thanks!
Good luck Luke.....that Jennings portrait epdg is tough to find.
